nodes.name: _getMarket

params.loanAmount: a new loan amount to consider in the ratio.

initialized().return: true if contract is initialized. Otherwise it returns false.

settings().details: This address should NOT change over the time. See details in the _setSettings(...) function.

decreaseSupply(address,address,uint256).notice: It decreases the supply amount for a given market.This function is called every new withdraw (Lenders) is done.

getMarket(address,address).notice: It gets the current market state.

getSupplyToDebt(address,address).notice: It gets the current supply-to-debt (StD) ratio for a given market.

getSupplyToDebtFor(address,address,uint2.notice: It gets the supply-to-debt (StD) ratio for a given market, including a new loan amount.

increaseBorrow(address,address,uint256).notice: It increases the borrowed amount for a given market.This function is called every new loan is taken out

increaseRepayment(address,address,uint25.notice: It increases the repayment amount for a given market.This function is called every new repayment is received.

increaseSupply(address,address,uint256).notice: It increases the supply amount for a given market.This function is called every new deposit (Lenders) is received.

initialize(address).notice: It initializes this Markets State instance.

initialized().notice: Gets if the contract is initialized.

settings().notice: The gets the settings contract address from the SETTINGS_SLOT.

userdoc.notice: This contract is used to store market data.
